titles.title: Southern California Desert Region Integrated Water and Economic Sustainability Plan Act

To amend the Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater Study and Facilities Act to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to participate in the Southern California Desert Region Integrated Water and Economic Sustainability Plan.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water and Power.

term.name: Federal aid to water resources development

bill.summary: 5/3/2006--Introduced. Southern California Desert Region Integrated Water and Economic Sustainability Plan Act - Amends the Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater Study and Facilities Act to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to participate in the design, planning, and construction of projects to implement the Mojave Water Agency's Integrated Regional Water Management Plan. Limits the federal cost share to 25%.
